sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Dashboard = () => { const quickActions = [ { title: 'Create Bill', icon: 'bi-receipt', description: 'Generate new bill', color: 'primary' }, { title: 'Manage Inventory', icon: 'bi-box-seam', description: 'View/Update stock', color: 'success' }, { title: 'Services', icon: 'bi-tools', description: 'Manage services', color: 'info' }, { title: 'Reports', icon: 'bi-graph-up', description: 'View sales reports', color: 'warning' }, ]; return (

Dashboard

Welcome to NSC Billing System

{quickActions.map((action, index) => (
{action.title}

{action.description}

 ))}
Recent Activity

Bill #001 - Oil Change Service - $85.00

Bill #002 - Spark Plugs - $45.00

Stock Updated - Engine Oil
Quick Stats

Today's Sales: $1,250.00

Bills Today: 8

Low Stock Items: 3
); }; export default Dashboard;
